text: Hello friends, does any of you know how to solve the problem of not being able to find the templates in the finder?

Hey <@U02RBEWE7PX>! Do you mean you can’t find a template searching in the Design Tools, or can’t find it when creating a page?

If it’s when you’re creating a page, I usually double check my template annotations when this happens. You’ll need:
```<!--
  templateType: page
  isAvailableForNewContent: true
-->```
as the minimum for it to show up in the template selection UI. More <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/html-hubl-templates#template-annotations|here>.
